title: AJ Style Wall Lamp Black
body: Another design for SAS Royal Hotel in Copenhagen (Radisson Blu) in 1960 by Arne Jacobsen. This style AJ Style Wall Lamp by Mobelaris is a great choice for bedrooms and reading nooks alike. It features a distinct asymmetrical shade and a downward fixture that emits direct light. This iconic design has become world renowned because of its capability to be tilted to optimize light distribution. The shadeâ€™s position can be easily adjusted and the white interior reflects soft and pleasant light.
